item.title: My First Post
item.description: Step 4: Add Some Content You can manually create content files (for example as content//.) and provide metadata in them, however you can use the new command to do few things for you (like add title and date):Step 4: Add Some Content You can manually create content files (for example as content//.) and provide metadata in them, however you can use the new command to do few things for you (like add title and date):Step 4: Add Some Content You can manually create content files (for example as content//.
